#ifndef CALCULATOR_H
#define CALCULATOR_H
#include <Arduino.h>
class Calculator
{
public:
    Calculator() {}
    int add(int a, int b);
    int minus(int a, int b);
};
#endif

‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå header ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå main ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå source code ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á class ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏®‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö

#include <calculator.h>
int Calculator ::add(int a, int b)
{
    return a + b;
}
int Calculator ::minus(int a, int b)
{
    return a - b;
}
